mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply_report WHERE reply_no = #{reply_no}

SELECT rr.report_no, rr.reply_no, r.post_no, rr.user_no, rr.reason, TO_CHAR(rr.report_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS report_date, rr.status FROM reply_report rr JOIN reply r ON rr.reply_no = r.reply_no ORDER BY rr.report_no DESC
